* Represents a command to add a task to the task list.
* Constructs an {@code AddCommand} with the specified task.

* Executes the add command by adding the task to the task list,
* displaying a confirmation message, and updating storage.
* @param taskList The task list to which the task is added.
* @param ui The user interface to display messages.
* @param storage The storage to update with the new task.

* Represents a generic command that can be executed by the chatbot.
* Constructs a {@code Command} with the specified index and task.

* @param taskList The task list to be manipulated.
* @param ui The user interface for displaying messages.
* @param storage The storage system for saving tasks.
* @throws Validator.TARSInvalidCommandParam If the command parameters are invalid.
* @throws Storage.TARSStorageOperationException If an error occurs while accessing storage.
public abstract void execute(TaskList taskList, Ui ui, Storage storage)
* Represents the different types of commands that can be executed by the chatbot.
BYE, LIST, MARK, UNMARK, TODO, DEADLINE, EVENT, DELETE, FIND, INVALID;
* Converts a string command into its corresponding {@code CommandType}.
* @return The corresponding {@code CommandType}, or {@code INVALID} if not recognized.
* Returns the string representation of the command type in lowercase.

* Represents a command to delete a task from the task list
* Constructs a {@code DeleteCommand} with the specified task index.
* @param index The index of the task to be deleted.
* Executes the delete command by removing the specified task from the task list,
* displaying a confirmation message, and updating storage.
* @param taskList The task list from which the task is removed.
* @param ui The user interface to display messages.
* @param storage The storage to update after deleting the task.
* @throws Validator.TARSInvalidCommandParam If the task index is invalid.
* @throws Storage.TARSStorageOperationException If an error occurs while writing to storage.
public void execute(TaskList taskList, Ui ui, Storage storage)
ui.printResponseMessage("Roger Captain. I've deleted this task.");
ui.printResponseMessage(String.format("You have %d task(s) in your list:", taskList.length()));

* Represents a command to list all tasks from the task list.
